chapter.title: MIME types and data stream formats in &carrot;
chapter.para: &carrot; component descriptors may include information about MIME types of the data streams accepted and produced by the component. This information is useful for detecting illegal combinations of components in a processing chain, but is not obligatory. Several MIME types defined for data exchange in &carrot; are presented in this chapter. Please note that components may support other data formats, not necessarily restricted to the list below (which is apt to be extended or modified according to our needs anyway).
